QuestData.Title: Sources of Darkness
QuestData.Description: I think I understand what he was trying to show us, $n.$b$bI feel a surge of power building ahead. They must be cultivating the Void, calling it here.$b$bWe need to stop them before they plunge this entire city into shadow. Find the source and cut it off by any means necessary.$b$bLocus-Walker and I have unfinished business to attend to.
QuestData.CompletionText: Locus-Walker and I have some unfinished business to attend to.
QuestData.RewardText: We buy time but nothing more.
